reviewText: Bought this for my Mom. She loves it! She would rather watch these movies/plays over and over again versus watching cable!

Loved Bashment Granny 2! Very funny and kepted me laughing the whole time! The actors were great! I had seen part one and it was awesome! Will buy more when they become available! Enjoyed shopping with you! Will recommend to family and friends! And the shipping was fast, everything was as stated! Thank you so much!
